description: This file defines a custom React hook named useNotes, which manages the state and CRUD operations for a notes application. It interacts with an external API client to fetch and update notes, and provides handlers for creating, saving, selecting, and deleting notes, while maintaining local component state such as loading indicators and errors.

methods.name: useNotes()
methods.description: Custom React hook that manages notes state, selection, loading, and errors, providing CRUD handlers and synchronization with API calls.
